reviews.review_msg: Really enjoyed his class.  I really enjoy his lectures, he seems to really care that people are following along with the material.

Lyle Crawford at Douglas College was by far the worst professor I have ever had in my 20 courses so far. I have barely learned anything all semester. I have a GPA of 3.1 and I have took two other philosophy courses in the past. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS, you will regret it, I was the lucky 6 out of 30 who passed the midterm.

Her lectures are honestly some of the most interesting I've ever attended. She has this incredible way of making complex ideas super relatable and engaging. You can tell she puts so much effort into her presentations and the reading materials. 
If you get the chance to study with Lidya, don't pass it up!

I don't know how someone can take a topic as interesting as philosophy of science and make me want to cry from boredom every class. There is no direction and she will elaborate on pretty menial parts of the textbook for an hour. She also has never responded to a single e-mail that I've ever sent her (despite her reassurances that she will).
